pageContext.claim: “This is Joe Biden, Bernie Sanders, AOC. They want to stop all deportation even of criminals, criminals. They come in as murderers, as drug dealers, as traffickers, stop all deportation, end the prosecution of illegal border crossers. So we can't prosecute people that illegally came into our country, even if they're really bad people.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden has called for a 100 day pause on deportations, but his plan specifically says he would continue to deport felons after that.
